      IEmailTemplateDescriptor getEmailTemplate(ILocale locale, String templateFilename)
      Returns the email template for the template filename. This assumes that the strTemplateName is just the fileName.
      IEmailTemplateDescriptor getEmailTemplate(String strTemplateFilename)
      Returns the email template for the template filename.
      IEmailTemplateDescriptor[] getEmailTemplates(String strTopic, String[] keywrds)
      @Deprecated use the locale aware version which also supports available symbols
      IEmailTemplateDescriptor[] getEmailTemplates(ILocale locale, Map<Object,Object> valuesToMatch)
      This is the routine that will perform the search of the available templates. If doing a locale specific search, it will search first the lang/country/var, then the lang/country, then the lang, then the default. The locales are subdirectories in the template directory with the directory name equalling the locale code.
      void setParameters(Map<Object,Object> params)
      This is called by the plugin initialization.

      • getEmailTemplate

        IEmailTemplateDescriptor getEmailTemplate(ILocale locale,
                                        String templateFilename)
        Returns the email template for the template filename. This assumes that the strTemplateName is just the fileName.
        Parameters:
        locale -
        templateFilename - The template filename.
        Returns:
        A email template instance corresponding to the specified template filename or null if no template corresponds to the name.

        Returns:

      • getEmailTemplates

        IEmailTemplateDescriptor[] getEmailTemplates(ILocale locale,
                                           Map<Object,Object> valuesToMatch)
        This is the routine that will perform the search of the available templates. If doing a locale specific search, it will search first the lang/country/var, then the lang/country, then the lang, then the default. The locales are subdirectories in the template directory with the directory name equalling the locale code.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to search for
        valuesToMatch - the values to test keys are "topic", "name", "keywords", "availablesymbols" availablesymbols are matched against the template's requiredsymbols
        Returns:
